column2: "Ha... Ha... There's more? There's no end to this."
"...Tamahime-chan? No, watch out!"
"...Well, well, that was close. I made it, somehow."
"Sukuna-hime! Were you and Kotoshiro alright?"
"There were a few enemies there as well. The reinforcement went well."
"Compared to that, they're more concentrated here... You two did well defending this place."
"<%me>, Matoi, I give you my thanks."
"No, that's not necessary. More importantly, the ceremony."
"Ahh, I know."
"We've been waiting, for this."
"We've been waiting, for you to come."
"W, what! What just fell!?"
"Oh, it got avoided."
"Ah, it got avoided."
"But, there's more to come."
"Yep. Lots, that won't miss."
"<%me>! What's going on! The reaction in front of you is..."
"From 10 years ago... [Apprentice]!"
"Little girl... Little girl...! You... making a fool out of me!"
"You... know me? I... know this person as well? ...Gh, uhhh, my head...!"
"……...Don't get cocky, black child. Not only do you get in my way, but my friends you also torment!"
"I am the Ashen Miko Sukuna-hime! I am the Miko of this planet! ...Don't underestimate me, brats!"
"...With my body as a stake and a barrier against evil, I activate the Braided Ash Formation!"
"I do not accept it, I refuse it... Gather ash and create tranquility! Everything, be purified!"
"...You two, are you alright?"
"Y, yeah, thanks to you. Thank you, Sukuna-hime. But..."
"I see you understand, Matoi. Since I sealed it incompletely, one part of [Magatsu] escaped."
"Well well, we've got hardship ahead. After such a long time, it looks like there's going to be some work to do."
"I'm sorry... You did it to save me."
"It was to help a friend. I did not hesitate. ...That's why, you shouldn't worry."
"Hmm, wasn't that kind of weird?"
"Weird, right? I wonder why \"it\" didn't target the Miko?"
"Did \"it\" have a grudge towards that girl? Isn't that kinda interesting?"
"Did \"it\" have a relationship with that girl? Isn't that kinda interesting?"
"Well, whatever. It's okay for now."
"Yep. It's okay. We accomplished our goal."
"Gray Gray Folklore"
"3章\u3000灰に塗れた伝承"
